name: RENPHO Smart Scale for Body Weight, FSA HSA Eligible, Digital Bathroom Scale BMI Weighing Bluetooth Body Fat Scale, Body Composition Monitor Health Analyzer with Smartphone App, 400 lbs - Elis 1

other_info.Special Feature: Precision Balanced, Backlit Display, Body Fat, Bone Mass, Auto Shut Off

about_this_item: Renpho smart app works in connection with fitness apps. Easy setup app works with Samsung Health, Fitbit and Apple Health. Renpho already has millions of happy global users

13 essential body measurements. Body weight shows on the scale, other body composition data including weight, BMI, body fat percentage stored in the app. Track everybody's metrics change on Renpho Health app
User-friendly app. Download Renpho Health at App Store or Google Play, also works with Apple Watch (Except for Apple Watch Series 1). Renpho Health App works with Bluetooth 4.0 and above

High-Quality Innovation. Auto calibration, high precision sensors measure in increments of 0.2 lb, 0.05 kg with 400 lbs, 180 kg capacity. 4 high sensitive electrodes. DO NOT let the sides of the digital weight scale, especially the four corners of the surface tempered glass hit any object, and it is recommended to wrap the four corners of the glass with soft objects

Monitor your progress, unlimited users and baby weighing mode. Renpho bathroom scale connects with apps to help motivate toward your goals, save historical data, and track your daily, weekly, and monthly progress. Use baby weighing mode for weighing baby or pets, 1 scale for whole family, support for adding unlimited users

title: Accurate
content: I like the idea of all the info and able to use an app to keep track of everything during my health journey. The look is sleek and modern. I still haven’t figured out how to hook up all connectivity but it does keep track of weight and BMI.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Great scale and slim. It’s heavy enough I don’t have to worry about it breaking easily or tipping over. I am still trying to figure out how to do the body fat mass percentage, no instructions came in box. But easy to read digital reading for weight.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2024

title: Great scale
content: The look is sleek and the app provides quite some comprehensive data. I stepped quite close to the edge of the scale by accident once and it tipped over almost making me fall. Make sure you step on the middle part of the scale to be safe!

title: Works well but be careful when you step on it
content: Today I went to go push it where I keep it and I accidentally hit it on a bottle that was sitting there and the scale broke. Instantly I thought I was going to have to pick up tons of tiny little shards, but it's shatterproof. This is a feature I did not know I wanted or needed. It made cleaning it up really easy and it was my fault completely, but I am so grateful.

title: Verified Purchase

He was right...this scale sets up in seconds, has it's own app, and tells you things about your body you never knew (of course some people might not want to know but still) Weight, BMI, Body Fat percentage, fat free body weight, subcutaneous fat, visceral fat, body water, skeletal muscle, muscle mass, bone mass, protein, and BMR...oh and metabolic age (not going to lie, I was insulted) you can store body measurements...honestly the options are endless.

title: Great data and AMAZING Customer Service
content: I bought this product at the end of 2023 and it has been great for over 8 months. The data that it tracks is incredible and it is very conveniently connected to an App on your phone. I started to experience a minor defect in the screen reading "888" repeatedly, but their customer service team sent me a brand new product! All they needed was a video or photo of the defect and my shipping address.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Great smart scale with bluetooth connectivity. Easy to read and very accurate. Comes with bettery. Tons of health info like BMI, muscle weight, sub fat, fat weight, etc. Renpho app can sync with Google Fit, Samsung Health and MyfitnessPal. Can be used by multiple users with their own Renpho app. Item arrived in good condition w/o damage, kudos to the delivery. Priced really low, cheaper than other scales out there. Highly recommended!!! 👍👍👍

title: Great smart scale that is easy on the pocket!
content: Love this scale! It is accurate, weight is same as my other scale. I love the app that goes with it. When getting started set up your measurements and goals if trying to loose weight otherwise just use the scale as a scale. It will on the app give you lots of informative about your body. When I get up in the morning I bring my phone in the bathroom pull up the app than weigh myself , I cute tune goes off after all the information is gathered. I am not too sure if all the information is exact but it is a real nice idea to go with. Keeps a good record for you also. I do not use all the features but i still really like this scale. Would recomend it.

title: Love it
content: This smart scale could possibly be one of the best I have gotten. The amount of information the scale gives you is incredible, and the compatible app makes the experience a lot better. The screen on the scale is very easy to read, using a bright red color. The slick appearance makes it fit in almost anywhere. It comes with AAA batteries that you can easily put in the scale. It is fairly easily to clean because of the glass top, but also make sure to dry it before every use as it DOES get slippery when wet. As for the weight, it is very light and fits in most places due to its compact size. My only issue (which isn’t really a dealbreaker for me or for most people) is that if you move it or turn it upside down, you have to recalibrate it. But that is easily done by just stepping on the scale with one foot.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024
